name: Plasma Spark
description: Plasma Spark improves Basic Attack Damage by 2% per point spent and enhances Lightning Crack:\n\nStriking with Lightning Crack adds a Sparks counter, stacking up to three times. Sparks are triggered when casting the Lightning Burst combo and increase its Critical Strike by 100%. Any Sparks Remaining will also be used to increase Critical Strike for Lightning Strike and Aurora Emitter by 100%.
